original: Kronqvist, Gustaf Adrian, kontraktsprost, Burs, f. 15/4/76 i Mariestad. G. 18 m. Rut Lindberg. Barn: Lars f. 19, Per 20, fänrik, _ Ulla 22, g. 46 m. veterinär Sven Österling, Britta 23, d. 28, Trude 26, Sara 36. — Mog:ex. i Upps. 00, teol. fil. ex. 01, teor. teol. ex. "Samt prästv. f. Visby stift 03, fil. mag. 12, provår 13-14. Domkyrkoadj. o. fattigv :pred. i Visby 03, past:adj. i Engelbrekts o. tyska förs. i Sthlm 07-15, lär. v. Sthlms sam-gymn. 08-09, fäng :pred. o. lär. v. Drottningens skyddshem 09-10, lär. v. Saltsjöbadens samlärov. 14-15, kyrkoh. i Burs o. Stånga 15, kontr :prost i Gotl. s. kontr. 38. Förordn. t. preses v. prästmöt. 40, led. av Visby domkap. 41-43. Skr.: Jöns Hjorter, en märklig lekmannapredikant. De tolv apostlarnas lära (övers. fr. grek.), Försoningen (prästmötesavh. 41). LVO.
translated: Kronqvist, Gustaf Adrian, parish priest, Burs, b. 15/4/76 in Mariestad. Married in 1918 to Rut Lindberg. Children: Lars b. 1919, Per b. 1920, second lieutenant, Ulla b. 1922, married in 1946 to veterinarian Sven Österling, Britta b. 1923, died in 1928, Trude b. 1926, Sara b. 1936. Completed Bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1900, Bachelor's degree in Theology in 1901, Master's degree in Theoretical Theology. Ordained as a priest for the Visby diocese in 1903, Master of Philosophy in 1912, probationary period from 1913-1914. Cathedral assistant and poor relief preacher in Visby in 1903, assistant pastor in Engelbrekts and German congregations in Stockholm from 1907-1915, teacher at Stockholm community gymnasium in 1908-1909, prison preacher and teacher at Drottningens Shelter in 1909-1910, teacher at Saltsjöbaden high school in 1914-1915, parish priest in Burs and Stånga from 1915, archpriest in Gotland South archpriestry from 1938. Appointed as chairman of the clergy meeting in 1940, member of the Visby cathedral chapter from 1941-1943. Writings: Jöns Hjorter, a remarkable lay preacher. The teachings of the Twelve Apostles (translated from Greek), The Atonement (clergy meeting discourse, 1941). Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (LVO).

employmentHistory.title: Cathedral Assistant and Poor Relief Preacher

works.name: De tolv apostlarnas lära (övers. fr. grek.)
